item.title: Gaza War Led to Deaths of More Than 3 Dozen Hostages, Officials Say
item.description: Israel’s leaders promised that their military campaign in Gaza would help save the lives of hostages. At least 41 have died in captivity, some killed ...

item.title: Scores of Civilians Killed by Government Forces in Syria, War Monitors Say
item.description: More than 500 people have been killed in fighting between forces of the new government and remnants of the ousted regime, according to a war monitor, ...

item.title: Gene Hackman Lost His Wife and Caregiver, and Spent 7 Days Alone
item.description: The exact details may never be known, but Mr. Hackman, 95 with advanced Alzheimer’s, was alone for about a week after his wife and sole caregiver died...

item.title: Gwen McCrae, Singer Who Helped Open the Dance Floor to Disco, Dies at 81
item.description: Originally a gospel singer, she went on to meld soulful melodies with dance-floor-friendly grooves on songs like the 1975 Top 10 hit “Rockin’ Chair.”

item.title: ‘You Can’t Pin Him Down’: Trump’s Contradictions Are His Ultimate Cover
item.description: President Trump’s shifting positions and outright lies have presented the American public with dueling narratives at every turn.
